name: US Foods Holding Corp.
summary: US Foods Holding Corp. is one of America’s largest foodservice distributors, supplying restaurants, healthcare, hospitality, government, and educational institutions with a broad portfolio of food products and related services. Headquartered in Rosemont, Illinois, and publicly traded under the ticker USFD, the company operates nationwide with approximately 30,000 employees and serves over 250,000 customers through more than 60 locations.
